src:
Liverpool-stjernen runder milep√¶l. Klopp beskriver ham som ¬´sensasjonell¬ª.
21 √•r gammel st√•r Trent Alexander-Arnold foran sin 100. kamp mot Liverpool.
02 Nov 2019, 08:53 by NTB
Kommer h√∏yrebacken p√• banen mot Aston Villa l√∏rdag runder han milep√¶len. Jubileumskampen finner i s√• fall sted litt over tre √•r etter at han fikk sin debut for Anfield-klubbens f√∏rstelag mot Tottenham.
Siden den gang har 21-√•ringen blant annet spilt to europeiske finaler, og i forrige m√•ned ble han nominert til den prestisjetunge Gullballen.
S√• langt har han spilt flere kamper for Liverpool enn idolet Steven Gerrard hadde gjort p√• samme tid.
‚Äì Det er en dr√∏m, du tenker ikke at du skal spille 100 kamper for Liverpool, sier Arnold i et intervju med lokalavisen Liverpool Echo.

LES OGS√Ö: Liverpool vant straffesparkkonkurransen etter ellevilt tim√•lsdrama



Trent Alexander-Arnolds innleggsfot er et viktig angrepsv√•pen for Liverpool.üì∑ Foto: Jon Super / AP / NTB scanpix.

Forbilde
21-√•ringen er den f√∏rste til √• innr√∏mme at karrieren har skutt fart p√• en m√•te han ikke hadde sett for seg.
‚Äì Du tenker ikke at det skal skje p√• denne m√•ten, og du tenker heller ikke at det skal skje s√• fort. N√•r jeg tenker tilbake, husker jeg ikke alle kampene, men det har v√¶rt tre fantastiske √•r, sier han.
Alexander Arnold sier m√•let er √• spille s√• mange kamper som mulig og n√¶rme seg kampantallet til store stjerner som Gerard og Carragher.
‚Äì Forh√•pentlig er det mange flere kamper i vente. Det er selvsagt viktig for meg at jeg n√• er rundt det samme antallet som Gerard og Carragher hadde (p√• samme tid), fordi jeg √∏nsket √• v√¶re dem da jeg vokste opp. Det er en stolt ting for meg √• h√∏re slikt, sier 21-√•ringen i intervjuet med lokalavisen.
Carragher og Gerard endte henholdsvis p√• 737 og 710 kamper i den r√∏de tr√∏ya.

SETT DENNE? Manchester United-angriper hyller Solskj√¶r: ‚Äì Han er en av de store avslutterne



Trent Alexander-Arnold har hatt stor suksess siden overgangen til Liverpool.üì∑ Phil Noble, Reuters / NTB scanpix

Lys fremtid
Manager J√ºrgen Klopp trekker frem backens posisjon som forbilde foran jubileumskampen.
‚Äì Han er en fantastiske rollemodell, og m√•ten han takler akkurat den rollen p√• er sensasjonell. Han er avslappet, men f√∏ler ansvaret likevel. Det er en forn√∏yelse √• jobbe med han. For √• v√¶re √¶rlig er det det beste jeg kan si om en spiller, sa tyskeren da han m√∏tte pressen fredag.
Klopp er full av beundring over m√•ten eleven har l√∏st oppgavene p√• de siste tre √•rene.
‚Äì Da han spilte sin f√∏rste kamp, sa han at det var bra og fantastisk, men at det ikke handlet om √• spille √©n kamp, men heller 100. N√• kan vi snakke om det, og det var ikke mange d√•rlige blant de 100 kampene, sa tyskeren.
Liverpool er klar p√• at dersom Trent Alexander Arnold holder seg frisk og skadefri er fremtiden lys for b√•de ham og klubben.
(¬©NTB)
text:
The Liverpool star rounds the milestone. Klopp describes him as "sensational".
21-year-old Trent Alexander-Arnold is ahead of his 100th game against Liverpool.
02 Nov 2019, 08:53 by NTB
Coming right back on the track against Aston Villa on Saturday he rounds the milestone. In that case, the anniversary match takes place just over three years after he made his debut for the Anfield club's first team against Tottenham.
Since then, the 21-year-old has played two European finals, and last month he was nominated for the prestigious Gold Ball.
So far he has played more matches for Liverpool than the idol Steven Gerrard had done at the same time.
"It's a dream, you don't think you're going to play 100 games for Liverpool," Arnold said in an interview with local newspaper Liverpool Echo.

ALSO READ: Liverpool won the penalty shootout after eleven-game two-goal drama



Trent Alexander-Arnold's inlay is an important weapon of attack for Liverpool.üì∑ Photo: Jon Super / AP / NTB scanpix.

Role model
The 21-year-old is the first to admit that his career has accelerated in a way he hadn't imagined.
- You don't think it should happen this way, nor do you think it should happen so quickly. When I think back, I don't remember all the fighting, but it's been three fantastic years, he says.
Alexander Arnold says the goal is to play as many matches as possible and approach the match numbers of big stars like Gerard and Carragher.
- Hopefully, there are many more games in store. Of course, it is important to me that I am now around the same number that Gerard and Carragher had (at the same time), because I wanted to be them when I was growing up. It is a proud thing for me to hear such, ‚Äùsays the 21-year-old in the interview with the local newspaper.
Carragher and Gerard ended 737 and 710 matches respectively in the red jersey.

SET THIS? Manchester United striker praises Solskjaer: - He is one of the big finishers



Trent Alexander-Arnold has had great success since the move to Liverpool.üì∑ Phil Noble, Reuters / NTB scanpix

Bright future
Manager J√ºrgen Klopp highlights the position of the slopes as a role model in front of the anniversary match.
- He is a fantastic role model, and the way he tackles exactly that role is sensational. He is relaxed, but still feels the responsibility. It's a pleasure working with him. To be honest, that's the best thing I can say about a player, the German said when he met the press on Friday.
Klopp is full of admiration for the way the student has solved the tasks over the past three years.
- When he played his first game, he said it was good and fantastic, but it wasn't about playing one game, but 100. Now we can talk about it, and there were not many bad ones among the 100 games, so German.
Liverpool are aware that if Trent Alexander Arnold stays healthy and injury-free, the future is bright for both him and the club.
(¬© NTB)
